SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui

Class TUI_Scene

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.tui.TUI_Scene
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scene
Direct Known Subclasses:
PrintBoardUI, PrintEndgameUI, PrintGameUI, PrintHelperUI, PrintNicknameSelectUI
public abstract class TUI_Scene extends Object implements Scene
Common parent class of all TUI scenes.
Implements all shared behaviours of the scenes such as the backlogs.

  • Method Details

    • setNotificationBacklog

      public final void setNotificationBacklog(List<String> backlog)
      Sets the notification backlog as a reference to the given list. All changes to the list are reflected in the scene.
      Parameters:
      backlog - the View's notification backlog
